sentences.sentence: We eventually pick two meals, marvelling at the cheapness.
sentences.translation: 最后我们点了两个菜，对价钱的便宜甚感惊讶。

sentences.sentence: And that negates some of the advantage of their initial cheapness.
sentences.translation: 而且这也否定了太阳能电池最初的廉价的一些优势。

sentences.sentence: So "economization" is not your friend. Cheapness can be value-less.
sentences.translation: 所以“缩减开支”不是你的朋友，而同样购买廉价商品也是没有价值的。
